translations: v．（液体）晃动，泼溅：液体在容器中或在表面上因移动或摇晃而发生泼溅。
· The water sloshes around in the bucket when I carry it.
当我拿着水桶时，水在桶里晃动。

sentences.sentence: The half-filled bottle sloshes; the full bottle remains still.; The dabbler in knowledge chatters away; the wise man stays silent.
sentences.translation: 一瓶子不响， 半瓶子晃荡。

sentences.sentence: The limestone walls sweat, and water sloshes around our boots.
sentences.translation: 石灰岩的墙上渗着水，我们的鞋上沾满了泥。

sentences.sentence: Put the lid on that jug in case the lemonade sloshes over the sides!
sentences.translation: 把盖子放在壶上，防止柠檬水泼溅！
